channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins DotCi Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins DotCi Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-41239|2024-08-03T12:35:49.574Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20dotci%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins DotCi Plugin 2.40.00 and earlier does not escape the GitHub user name parameter provided to commit notifications when displaying them in a build cause, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-41237|2024-08-03T12:35:49.556Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20dotci%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins DotCi Plugin 2.40.00 and earlier does not configure its YAML parser to prevent the instantiation of arbitrary types, resulting in a remote code execution vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-41238|2024-08-03T12:35:49.566Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20dotci%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins DotCi Plugin 2.40.00 and earlier allows unauthenticated attackers to trigger builds of jobs corresponding to the attacker-specified repository for attacker-specified commits.
